nodes.text: Bunurrut was a male individual who served in the Peace Brigade during the Yuuzhan Vong War. Bunurrut was the captain of the Corellian gunship Vigor and at some point during the conflict, Bunurrut led the Vigor and the YV-929 armed freighter Blunt Force during a scheme to pose as two New Republic ships, to allow them to take custody of refugees being carried aboard the Wanderhome.
